akas: Unni Is Alive World-wide (English title) (alternative title)
Sister Is Alive World-wide (English title) (alternative title)
akas from release info: Unni Is Alive World-wide (English title) (alternative title)
Sister Is Alive World-wide (English title) (alternative title)

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: In the premiere episode, three women's lives are thrown into chaos. But before all that, they must overcome the challenges of their everyday lives.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Kang Ha Ri finds herself in a pickle after accidentally humiliating her would-be father-in-law. Yang Dal Hee's attempt to clear her name quickly escalates out of control. Deul Rae deals with a stalker.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Gi Chan is overjoyed to find Dal Hee back in Korea, but doesn't realize his flowers are at risk. Ruby Cosmetics' top brass goes to great lengths to steal Gi Chan's precious flowers.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Finally, all three women's lives intersect in a tragic series of events.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: With Gi Chan's work stolen from him, he struggles to move on. Kim Eun Hyang learns more about her daughter's unfortunate death.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Kim Eun Hyang is shocked by her husband's betrayal, but has bigger plans in mind. The Ruby Corporation continue their devious plot against Gi Chan.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: With the stalker taken care of, Deul Rae must decide whether or not she wants to go on living. Dal Hee continues to move up the ranks at Ruby Corporation.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Choo Tae Soo is put to the test for being a bad man. Koo Se Jun must go to America, but his sweet club-loving grandma is having none of it.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Kang Ha Ri's interview at Ruby Cosmentic starts off with a bang, but will she get the job, or even recognize the dastardly woman interviewing her?

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: With Deul Rae's finances in ruins, her house is sold to the highest bidder, but she could never imagine who her new landlord is.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: The women move one step closer to finding out the truth after a witness comes forward more than a year after the accident.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: The cab driver from a year ago holds all the answers, but will he truly come through for the ladies?

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: With the makeup expo in full swing, Seol Gi Chan has more than one bombshell to drop.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Seol Gi Chan is down, but not out for the count. Elsewhere, lies unravel at an alarming rate.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Ms. Kim confronts her ex-husband. Hong Shi spends the day with Min Duel Rae

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: The landlord tries to rescue Min Duel Rae from her past. The interns prepare for their presentation.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: After a disastrous presentation, the Ruby interns must forge forward on a path of forgiveness. Kim Eun Hyang enacts the more vicious part of her plan.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Min Deul Rae decides to make a bold move against her stalker. Romance unfurls elsewhere.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Geun Ja breaks free from his family's old ways. Gi Chan unveils his newest makeup creation.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Privy to Grandma's sudden realization, Ms. Lee hatches yet another evil plan. Will she ever be stopped?

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: Who knew a knock on the door could change someone's life? Will Koo Se Kyung escape this situation unscathed?

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Adultery is the name of the game, and now everyone's playing. Will anyone's marriage remain intact after all this?

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: With Grandma Goon Ja in the hospital, Ms. Lee tries to complete her evil plan.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Ms. Lee makes her move and leaves her mark, accompanied by an unexpected ally.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: As the Koo family self-destructs, one cunning woman rises to the top.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: The search is on for the missing (and adorable) Hong Shi. Who will find her first?

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: Koo Pil Soon gets wise to Ms. Lee's nefarious plot, but struggles to think of what to do next.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: Finally, all those wronged by the Koo family come together and plan their retribution.

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: Various members of the Koo family zero in on Gi Chan's hidden identity. Meanwhile Kim Eun Hyang is at a loss for what to do next.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: Kim Eun Hyang throttles her plan into high gear and lets everything out. Will the Se Kyung's family survive this ordeal?

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot: Ko Se Joon takes his evil mother on a joyride that she'll never forget. Will they make it back to the house alive?

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot: Both Kim Eun Hyang and Ko Se Joon are resolved to let the truth come out, but will they succeed?

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: With Kang Ha Ri and Seol Gi Chan caught red handed, the Ko family finally gains the upper hand.

34.title: Episode #1.34
34.plot: No one can get Hong Shi out of their mind as her adoption day draws close.

35.title: Episode #1.35
35.plot: Sarah's mom comes to visit. Is the gig up?

36.title: Episode #1.36
36.plot: The wedding day is finally here. What could go wrong?

37.title: Episode #1.37
37.plot: Seol Gi Chan finally finds out the true identity of "Sarah Park."

38.title: Episode #1.38
38.plot: Ko Se Kyung is at Sarah Park's throat, but she's not the only one out for blood.

39.title: Episode #1.39
39.plot: Seol Gi Chan learns the truth about his identity, but will he be able to handle it?

40.title: Episode #1.40
40.plot: The Chairman is put into a difficult situation: Can he solve his own son's murder?

41.title: Episode #1.41
41.plot: After being viciously attacked, Seol Gi Chan comes back even stronger.

42.title: Episode #1.42
42.plot: Sarah Park's pregnancy act starts slipping, but the Chairman is blinded by love.

43.title: Episode #1.43
43.plot: The bad guys get their way, but is it true, is Grandma really alive?

44.title: Episode #1.44
44.plot: A doctor visits Sarah Park to check on her pregnancy much to her dismay. Will she weasel her way out of this one too?

45.title: Episode #1.45
45.plot: Min Deul Rae has Ms. Lee on the ropes, and Sarah Park must face the mother of the woman whose identity she stole.

46.title: Episode #1.46
46.plot: Hong Shi must decide if she wants to take a stand against her evil sister.

47.title: Episode #1.47
47.plot: The Chairman and Min Deul Rae go on a fun camping trip while being followed. Ko Se Kyung awaits test results.

48.title: Episode #1.48
48.plot: Ko Se Kyung gets bad news, but will she ever change her ways?

49.title: Episode #1.49
49.plot: Now that Ms. Top Star has learned the truth from Hong Shi, there's nothing holding her back.

50.title: Episode #1.50
50.plot: With Sarah Park... no, Yang Dal Hae, finally on her own, can she survive?

51.title: Episode #1.51
51.plot: Yang Dal Hee makes a last ditch effort to claw her way back to prosperity.

52.title: Episode #1.52
52.plot: Can Seol Gi Chan spirit little Hong Shi back to her loving family?

53.title: Episode #1.53
53.plot: With Yang Dal Hee living with the Na family, will she able to steal Hong Shi's SD card?

54.title: Episode #1.54
54.plot: Ko Se Kyung begins to repair relationships long thought unrepairable.

55.title: Episode #1.55
55.plot: Ko Se Kyung shows up at the Na household promising evidence against the real culript.

56.title: Episode #1.56
56.plot: Ko Se Joon finds out his family name might not be so set in stone. Yang Dal Hee attempts to murder an elder.

57.title: Episode #1.57
57.plot: After learning the horrible truth from his daughter, the Chairman collapses and won't be waking up any time soon.

58.title: Episode #1.58
58.plot: The two evil women continue to jockey for position. Madame Sa's birthday approaches.

59.title: Episode #1.59
59.plot: The day of reckoning has arrived for the vile Ms. Lee.

60.title: Episode #1.60
60.plot: With Ms. Lee in jail, Yang Dal Hee knows that she'll be next, so she plays her final card.

61.title: Episode #1.61
61.plot: After getting smashed in the head with a vase, Se Joon goes to the hospital.

62.title: Episode #1.62
62.plot: Yang Dal Hee attempts to murder Grandma again.

63.title: Episode #1.63
63.plot: Koo Se Kyung's cancer strikes at the worst possible moment.

64.title: Episode #1.64
64.plot: Yang Dal Hee tries out a new scheme to return to the house

65.title: Episode #1.65
65.plot: Koo Se Kyung comes forward with the truth and nothing but the truth.

66.title: Episode #1.66
66.plot: Will Gong Yong Group successfully merge with Vicky Jung's company?

67.title: Episode #1.67
67.plot: When faced with damning evidence, will the evil women finally be toast?

68.title: Episode #1.68
68.plot: Now that six years have passed, how will the story end in the series finale?

imdb.plot outline: Kim Joo Hyun (aka Han Joo Hyun from Modern Farmer), Jang Seo Hee (Obstetrics and Gynecology Doctors) and Oh Yoon Ah (Saimdang, Light's Diary) star in an ensemble drama that proves the bonds of joy and love are stronger than even death. When three women lose their loved ones at the same time, they band together and help each other get through the pain and jointly raise a child. The first "sister" is Kang Ha Ri (Kim Joo Hyun), who has a super personality that's probably a bit too bright for her profession. She is a part-timer, who works at a stationary store and nail shop. The second "sister" is Min Deul Re (Jang Seo Hee). She was once a popular actress. But the industry is brutal and the rule is simple: for the vast majority of actors and actresses, youth gone equals career gone. Now, she's just a has-been. The third "sister" is Kim Eun Hyang (Oh Yoon Ah), who is chic and elegant. She once worked as a secretary at a huge firm. However, now she focuses entirely on raising her daughter. Together, these three focus on helping each other through tough times and face everything life throws their way. Looking for a way to heal, they bring some joy into their life by caring for a young girl together. Joining the cast is also Seol Ki Chan (Lee Ji Hoon from Go Ho's Starry Night), a man who grew up in an orphanage and Yang Dal Hee (Kim Da Som, aka Dasom from SISTAR), a charming and intelligent girl who also seems to lie quite a bit and hates being poor. Can the band of sisters cope with all that is coming their way via sisterhood, or is life a little more difficult than simply "fighting?" Also known as "Unni is Alive" and "Sister is Alive," Band of Sisters is directed by Choi Hyeong Hun, who fans will remember for his work on Second to Last Love. The drama is written by Kim Sun Ok (Temptation of an Angel), who is reuniting with her Temptation of Wife star Jang Seo Hee. Band of Sisters will air on DramaFever with two episodes every Wednesday starting on April 19, 2017 for a du
